channel.title: [PI] Npc Dialogue Help
channel.description:
Trying to make a Easter Event and my Npc " Easter Bunny " is supposed to assign my players to search for the missing eggs. Once the user finds the eggs it delete's them from the Inventory and rewards them with Bunny Ears and the Easter Ring.
What i have done right now is this. Teleport to the event area. Easter bunny spawned. Objects with Items inside and working. Only thing i need help on is what i explained above is so once you get all 4 eggs you talk to the bunny and he takes them and rewards you. That's where im clueless. Please Help
[img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/5203/48b0ec6a5dba42a28a9f43c.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Npc Dialogue Help
item.dc:creator: @David-mod_of_lordsca David-mod_of_lordscape
item.description:
@David-mod_of_lordsca wrote:

Trying to make a Easter Event and my Npc " Easter Bunny " is supposed to assign my players to search for the missing eggs. Once the user finds the eggs it delete’s them from the Inventory and rewards them with Bunny Ears and the Easter Ring.

What i have done right now is this. Teleport to the event area. Easter bunny spawned. Objects with Items inside and working. Only thing i need help on is what i explained above is so once you get all 4 eggs you talk to the bunny and he takes them and rewards you. That’s where im clueless. Please Help
